targets.rawSql:
USE [LogRhythm_LogMart];
SELECT
  [Avg MPS] = CAST(SUM(CAST(CountProcessedLogs as BIGINT)) AS real) / CAST(DATEDIFF(ss,$__timeFrom(),$__timeTo()) as BIGINT),
	[Max MPS] = CAST(MAX(CountProcessedLogs) AS float) / 60.0
FROM
	[dbo].StatsDeploymentCountsMinute with (NOLOCK)
WHERE  $__timeFilter(StatDate);

SELECT
  COUNT(*)
FROM
  LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.MsgSource with (NOLOCK)
WHERE
  RecordStatus = 1 AND Name NOT LIKE 'AI Engine%'
  AND MsgSourceTypeID != 3
  AND MsgSourceTypeID != 1000539
AND MsgSourceTypeID != 1000162
AND MsgSourceTypeID != 1000158
AND MsgSourceTypeID != 1000059
AND MsgSourceTypeID != 1000044

select 
  $__timeGroup(StatDate, '1d') AS time,
  [Logs Processed] = SUM(cast(CountProcessedLogs as bigint))
from 
  LogRhythm_LogMart.dbo.StatsDeploymentCountsHour with (NOLOCK)
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(StatDate)
group by 
   $__timeGroup(StatDate, '1d');

SELECT
	count(*) as Count
FROM
  	LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK)
  	  JOIN
	  LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule ar
	    ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID
    AND
  $__timeFilter(DateInserted)

SELECT
	msg.Alarm_Priority,
	COUNT(*) as Count
FROM
  (SELECT
	CASE 
		WHEN Priority >= 90 THEN 'P1'
		WHEN Priority BETWEEN 80 and 89 THEN 'P2'
		WHEN Priority BETWEEN 65 and 79 THEN 'P3'
		WHEN Priority BETWEEN 50 and 64 THEN 'P4'
		WHEN Priority < 50 THEN 'P5'
	END AS Alarm_Priority,
	MsgID
FROM 
	LogRhythm_Events.dbo.Msg with (NOLOCK)) msg
	  JOIN
	(SELECT 
		a.DateInserted,
		atm.MARCMsgID,
		a.AlarmID,
		DATEDIFF(MINUTE,am.GeneratedOn,am.OpenedOn) TTT,
		DATEDIFF(MINUTE,am.GeneratedOn,am.InvestigatedOn) TTD,
		DATEDIFF(MINUTE,am.InvestigatedOn,am.ClosedOn) TTR
	FROM 
		LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK) 
			JOIN 
		LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.AlarmToMARCMsg atm with (NOLOCK) 
			ON a.AlarmID = atm.AlarmID
			JOIN
		[LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmMetrics] am with (NOLOCK) 
			ON a.AlarmID = am.AlarmID
			JOIN
		[LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].AlarmRule ar
		  ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID 
		WHERE 
		  ar.[AlarmType] = 5
		    and
      $__timeFilter(a.DateInserted)) amsg
		ON amsg.MARCMsgID = msg.MsgID
GROUP BY
	msg.Alarm_Priority
ORDER BY 
	CASE msg.Alarm_Priority
		WHEN 'Critical' THEN 1
		WHEN 'High' THEN 2
		WHEN 'Medium' THEN 3
		WHEN 'Low' THEN 4
		WHEN 'Very Low' THEN 5
	END

select 
  $__timeGroup(StatDate, '1d') AS time,
  [Alarms] = SUM(cast(CountAlarms as bigint))
from 
  LogRhythm_LogMart.dbo.StatsDeploymentCountsHour with (NOLOCK)
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(StatDate)
group by 
   $__timeGroup(StatDate, '1d');

SELECT 
    Entity.Name AS 'Entity',
    COUNT(AlarmName.Name) AS Total_Alarms
FROM 
    [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] AS Alarm
JOIN 
    LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule AS AlarmName ON Alarm.AlarmRuleID = AlarmName.AlarmRuleID
JOIN 
    LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.Entity AS Entity ON Entity.EntityID = Alarm.EntityID
WHERE 
    $__timeFilter(Alarm.DateInserted)
    AND AlarmName.[AlarmRuleGroup] != 'LogRhythm Diagnostics' -- Exclusion des alarmes diagnostics
GROUP BY 
    Entity.Name
ORDER BY 
    Total_Alarms DESC;

SELECT
entity.FullName,
   avg(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, alarm_table.DateInserted, a.DateInserted)) AS 'Time to Detect',
   avg(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, a.DateInserted, b.DateInserted)) AS 'Time to Acknowledge',
   avg(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, b.DateInserted, c.DateInserted)) AS 'Time to Qualify',
   avg(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, c.DateInserted, d.DateInserted)) AS 'Time to Report',
   avg(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, c.DateInserted, e.DateInserted)) AS 'Time to Resolve'
FROM [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmHistory] a
JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] alarm_table
   ON a.AlarmID = alarm_table.AlarmID
join [LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].[Entity] as entity on alarm_table.EntityID=entity.EntityID
LEFT JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmHistory] b
   ON a.AlarmID = b.AlarmID
   AND b.Comments = 'Changed status to: Open: Working'
LEFT JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmHistory] c
   ON a.AlarmID = c.AlarmID
   AND (c.Comments = 'Changed status to: Closed: False Alarm' OR c.Comments = 'Changed status to: Open: Escalated')
LEFT JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmHistory] d
   ON a.AlarmID = d.AlarmID
   AND d.Comments = 'Changed status to: Closed: Reported'
LEFT JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmHistory] e
   ON a.AlarmID = e.AlarmID
   AND e.Comments = 'Changed status to: Closed: Resolved'
WHERE a.Comments = 'Changed status to: Open'
group by entity.FullName

SELECT
entity.FullName,
   avg(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, alarm_table.DateInserted, a.DateInserted)) AS 'Time to Detect',
   avg(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, a.DateInserted, b.DateInserted)) AS 'Time to Acknowledge',
   avg(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, b.DateInserted, c.DateInserted)) AS 'Time to Qualify',
   avg(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, c.DateInserted, d.DateInserted)) AS 'Time to Report',
   avg(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, c.DateInserted, e.DateInserted)) AS 'Time to Resolve'
FROM [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmHistory] a
JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] alarm_table
   ON a.AlarmID = alarm_table.AlarmID
join [LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].[Entity] as entity on alarm_table.EntityID=entity.EntityID
LEFT JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmHistory] b
   ON a.AlarmID = b.AlarmID
   AND b.Comments = 'Changed status to: Open: Working'
LEFT JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmHistory] c
   ON a.AlarmID = c.AlarmID
   AND (c.Comments = 'Changed status to: Closed: False Alarm' OR c.Comments = 'Changed status to: Open: Escalated')
LEFT JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmHistory] d
   ON a.AlarmID = d.AlarmID
   AND d.Comments = 'Changed status to: Closed: Reported'
LEFT JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmHistory] e
   ON a.AlarmID = e.AlarmID
   AND e.Comments = 'Changed status to: Closed: Resolved'
WHERE a.Comments = 'Changed status to: Open'
group by entity.FullName

SELECT
 count(*) as Count
FROM
  	[LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] with (NOLOCK)
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([DateCreated])

SELECT [Owner], [Case Collaborators],  (SELECT DATEDIFF_BIG (ss, CAST([Date Earliest Evidence] as datetime), CAST([Date Created]as datetime))) TTD,  (SELECT DATEDIFF_BIG(ss, CAST([Date Incident] as datetime), CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTR,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Earliest Evidence] as datetime),CAST([Date Created] as datetime))) TTQ,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Created] as datetime),CAST([Date Incident] as datetime))) TTI,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Incident] as datetime),CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTM,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Created] as datetime),CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTV FROM [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[vw_Cases]
WHERE $__timeFilter([Date Created])

SELECT
 count(*) as Count
FROM
  	[LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] c with (NOLOCK)
  	join 
  	LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.CaseStatus cs
  	ON c.CaseStatusID = cs.CaseStatusID
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([DateCreated]) AND cs.IsClosedStatus = 0

SELECT
 count(*) as Count
FROM
  	[LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] c with (NOLOCK)
  	join 
  	LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.CaseStatus cs
  	ON c.CaseStatusID = cs.CaseStatusID
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([DateCreated]) AND cs.IsClosedStatus = 1

SELECT
 count(*) as Count
FROM
  	[LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] c with (NOLOCK)
  	join 
  	LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.CaseStatus cs
  	ON c.CaseStatusID = cs.CaseStatusID
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([DateCreated]) AND cs.IsClosedStatus = 0 AND cs.Name = 'Incident'

WITH AvgTimes AS (
  SELECT
    COUNT(*) AS Count,
    [EntityID]
  FROM 
    LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case] WITH (NOLOCK)
  GROUP BY
    [EntityID]
)
SELECT
  e.[Name] AS EntityName,
  at.Count
FROM 
  AvgTimes at
LEFT JOIN 
  [LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].[Entity] e ON at.[EntityID] = e.[EntityID]
WHERE 
  e.[Name] IS NOT NULL;

SELECT
  [Priority],
  AVG(DATEDIFF(MiNute,[DateEarliestEvidence],[DateCreated])) avgTTD,
	AVG(DATEDIFF(MiNute,[DateCreated],[DateClosed])) avgTTR,
  COUNT(*) as Count
 FROM 
	LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case] with (NOLOCK)
WHERE  $__timeFilter([DateCreated])
GROUP BY
  [Priority]
ORDER BY
  [Priority] ASC
